unit_1.unit_title: Day 1: Introduction to HTML and Basic Structure
unit_1.unit_objective: Master day 1: introduction to html and basic structure concepts and achieve: Understand the fundamental purpose of HTML., Set up a development environment for writing and viewing HTML.
unit_outcomes: Understand the fundamental purpose of HTML.
Set up a development environment for writing and viewing HTML.
Create a basic HTML document with the essential structural tags.
Distinguish between HTML elements and attributes.
